article_title: Fewer Employers Consider Dropping Coverage Due To Obamacare

article_metadata.description: The likelihood that small employers will terminate health coverage for their workers due to the Affordable Care Act is far less likely than the “early days of the health reform debate,” according to a new analysis. Employee benefits consultancy Mercer, a subsidiary of Marsh & McLennan Companies, said just 7% of [...]
